SUB_W08_WRLD_BOFO_START_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_WRLD_BOFO_START_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Shoot, I smell dirt! You reckon we're
under the ground somehow?

SUB_W08_WRLD_BOFO_START_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_WRLD_BOFO_START_000_CUT_000_001.text:
Are we supposed to just dig around
until we find a triangle?

SUB_W08_WRLD_BOFO_START_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_WRLD_BOFO_START_000_CUT_000_010.text: Feels like we fell into a trap.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Hm? Something's moving at my feet.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Worm! Right nasty feller, too.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Stay away from that worm, you!
It's mine!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Whoa!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Huh. Haven't seen you two before.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
It's rude to jump out of the ground and surprise
folks like that, feller—I nearly thought you were
a bug and squashed you flat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't care if it's rude.
I want the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: All yours, pardner.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You sure? I mean, really sure? Worm this big is a pretty rare find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Just get the dang thing
outta my sight already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yesss! Now I can finally go home!
You're good people, strangers. Take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait! We're searching for a triangle.
Do you know anything about that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Nope—but good luck all the same.
Bye now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Wait!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: What is it this time?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Are we really stuck underground right now?
'Cause I ain't seein' an exit anywhere,
and I know I ain't diggin' outta here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait. You can't dig holes?
How have you two LIVED!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
We've dug holes as part of our trainin',
but that's about it—and that was also
VERTICAL diggin'.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yeesh, I can't follow a word you say.
Fine, I'll take you to my house—
but then you're on your own. Capisce?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Much obliged. Oh, and I'm Bonnie Blair,
and this here is Formina Franklyn.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I'm Tope, of the Kuld.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Boy howdy, you sure
dug that hole quick!

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
The trick is to look for spots
where the earth is soft.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ain't there any pre-built tunnels
for gettin' around here?

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nope. We can't make any since our holes
just fill in on their own after a while.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text: That sounds like a right hassle.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
That's 'cause you gotta look
at the big picture! See, when the earth gets dug up and filled in,
it makes the soil more fertile. That fertile
soil goes on to nurture nutrient-rich worms,
which all of us then chow down on.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
So that's why y'all got such
big worms in these parts!

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I dunno about that.
All I know is that we couldn't get
by if we didn't do it this way.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Crummy thing is that worms have been real
hard to come by lately—but that's a tale
for another time. Now let's go home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Here's the colony where
we Kuld live.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Your friends live here too, huh?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Dunno if I'd call 'em that; Kuld typically work alone, and we never form groups. We only meet up like this because it's a convenient way to keep everybody safe.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
C'mon, let's go to my house.
It's over there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Coste! I'm home!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Late again, Tope! Ground below, how long
does it take to catch one measly worm!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! I'm hungry!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: I know, honey. I know.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
See that? Your poor son is starving!
Now hand over the worms already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Here you go, honeybunch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you KIDDING me!? This is it?
Well, that's just pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Sorry, sweetie, but you know how poor
the hunting's been lately, and—

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't want to hear your excuses!
How pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Thought you said you fellers work alone;
I didn't reckon you to have a family!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: We work alone. That doesn't mean we don't have families.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, a guest! Well, this is unusual.
Why didn't you tell me you were bringing
someone home, you grubhead!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
This is Bonnie and her friend.
They gave me the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
This is my wife, Coste,
and my son, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Hey there, folks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry you had to see such a disgraceful
display, strangers. We don't have much,
but please make yourself at home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: And as for you, Tope...

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Yes, sweetlips?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You're an idiot if you think this single
worm is enough for us! Little Gourmand
here is a growing pup, you know!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! When's fooooood!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Of course, honey. I'll be right back.
Just hold on, all right, Son?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
So you said earlier you been having
trouble catching worms. Why's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
It's like their population just dried up
all of a sudden. And it's not just worms—
other creatures too.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Right, but do you know why?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Nope, but I'm looking into it—because if
this continues, we're all gonna starve.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Looked to me like your family don't
know any of this. That right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
The last thing I want to do is cause
Coste any unnecessary worry.
Nope, this is something where I just
have to carry my own water.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I'm gonna get back to investigating.
What're you two going to do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, I thought we might tag along! Since we ain't
no shucks at diggin' holes, I think it's best if we
help out with your little investigation.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, today I'm goin' farther than usual,
so we might end up runnin' into other species.
Sure you're ready for that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
There are more species in this world
than just you Kuld, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
A few, yeah—though we don't usually
interact, so I can't tell you much more. This world's got a kind of code, see:
stick to your own, avoid unnecessary spats,
and you'll generally be golden.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
One of the Bashar might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text: Reckon that's one of 'em right there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey! Get outta here, you!
This is Kuld territory!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Stop yelling, you silly mole!
What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Oh, Coste! What a relief!
Where were you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
We both got bored waiting for you
to come home, so we took a little
walk to kill some time.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry, honeypants, but it's not safe out
here right now. In fact, you should just stay
away from the colony altogether for a bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Don't need to tell me twice—just make
sure you come home with some good
worms this time. You hear me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Yes, thanks to you. Also, you're one
of the Kuld that live here, right?
Tope, I think?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
That's me, all right. But tell me,
have you seen a mole named Coste?
She's my wife.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Sure did! Said she was worried
and headed out to try and find you.
A real firecracker, that one!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, at least she's not here.
That's a relief.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
You know anything about the
Bashar who tussled with you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Nope. All I know is they came
after me outta nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.text: One of the Naml might be at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.text: Reckon that's one of 'em right there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.text:
You know anything about the
Naml who tussled with you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.text:
One of the Dufda might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.text: Reckon that's one of 'em right there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
You're not making this easy!
Whatever. Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
You know anything about the
Dufda who tussled with you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
This is the only colony we ain't visited yet.
The Lord of the Earth is gonna be here—
I feel right sure of it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text: This is my house, and I will protect it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
The ground is shaking...
It's coming!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text: It's not moving... Is it over?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
We weren't meant to destroy it, right?
I mean, the thing can hardly purify
the earth if it's in pieces.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Sure, but it warn't exactly a foe we could
hold back against, neither. Sorry, Tope.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
No, it's better this way; I actually hate the
thought of relying on something called
the 'Lord of the Earth' to survive.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh, and this thing was attached
to the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Another triangle—and the frame is resonatin'.
This is definitely what we came lookin' for;
we must'a been meant to travel around with
you this whole durn time, Tope!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Huh. I guess fate dispatched you here to
make us realize we needed to return our
world to its former worm-filled glory
without relying on the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
I think you're overstating our importance
here just a bit. Right, Bonnie?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, I kinda got the feeling you two weren't
THAT amazing—I just thought saying it would
make this whole thing feel a bit more like
a grand finale, y'know?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
As for us, I feel confident we'll take
back our wormy world without the
help of some 'Lord.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Tope! Where in the WORLD
have you been!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Gourmand? I'm gonna do it.
I'M GONNA DOOOOO IT!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh for the love of dirt... Maybe stop all
this fool yelling and go get us some worms,
you good-for-nothing mole!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ERRORS REPAIRED. RESTARTING.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Still up for more, huh!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ALL SYSTEMS GREEN. SOIL CONTAMINATION DETECTED. INITIATING CLEANUP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Huh? It left.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
It looks like our attempt was a success;
it's started to purify the earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Then we did it?
We saved the world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
The frame's resonatin'! This's for
sure the triangle we're after.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Which means everything went
exactly as it should've.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We owe it all to you, pardner.
Reckon we can't thank you enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha! You sure do! ...Er, although I suppose
you two pulled your own weight. So thanks
for everything—and take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Coste! Gourmand! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm bored of worms, Mommy!
I wanna eat something TASTY!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: WHAAAAAAT!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
...And that's why I need you
to take my son with you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
You sure that's wise? Our journey
ain't gonna be all fun and games—
or maybe any, for that matter.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
All children need to leave the burrow
sometime, and I know you'll take very
good care of our little Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Yaaay! I can't wait to eat
all of the tasties!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Well, if that's really what you want,
let the Twilight Area vittles tour begin!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We'll rest easy knowing our son
is with the two of you. Now don't make any trouble, Son.
You do everything they say, all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Have fun, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Yaaaaaay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
So was that really the Lord of the Earth?
I mean, it could have just been one of the
carnivorous mushrooms the Naml use, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
Are you suggesting
the Naml lied to us?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
Does that mean it ain't possible
to purify the earth after all?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning it up, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about being eaten alive by some gigantic mushroom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
That would mean the Naml were just usin' us
this whole time—although I reckon all's still
well that ends well.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
The Naml have probably been waiting for people
as strong as you to appear this whole time.
Still, you wouldn't have been able to get around
without my help, so I hope you're grateful!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
No, you're right: If we hadn't met you,
we likely wouldn't have found the triangle
or ended up saving the world. So thank you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Heh. Not one for modesty, is he?
Well, see you around, Tope.
Take care of your family.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
This has to be some bad Dufda
joke that went a little too far.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
We were meant to be subdue it,
but we ended up destroying it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
Was that really the Lord of the Earth?
If so, we might've just messed up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning up the earth, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about that thing swallowing me whole.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
I wasn't feeling good about our odds
of winnin' when I saw how big it was,
but we managed to pull through.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
If that really was the Lord of the Earth,
it should start cleaning up the soil now.
Then you'll be able to catch worms again.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
Yeah, I suppose it might've actually
been the Lord of the Earth... You know what? I'm gonna say it was.
Heck, it renewed our soil, after all!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the origin of that
big quake earlier.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Be on your guard there, pardner.
Something's comin'.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.text: UNABLE TO BOOT NORMALLY. SWITCHING TO START/STOP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
I was expectin' some huge monster,
but this here's just a machine.
Reckon it's gonna purify the soil?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.text: ERROR. ERROR. ERROR. UNABLE TO EXECUTE START/STOP PROCESS. NORMAL OPERATIONS NOT GUARANTEED.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.text: TERRAFORMING PROCESS DEEMED A FAILURE. BEGINNING RESET OF WORLD ENVIRONMENT. ALERT. ALERT. THIS PROCESS IS DANGEROUS. OPERATORS MUST TAKE SHELTER IMMEDIATELY.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.text:
We need to stop that thing
in a right dang hurry!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.text:
I reckon it's on its way to
attack one'a the colonies.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
This is the Lord of the Earth?
But it's just another insect!
How's this gonna renew the soil?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
There's something off about these bugs.
Their eyes are...dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Don't make no difference what a buncha
dang bug eyes look like! Now get up,
'cause you got soil to clean!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I've got an awful feeling about this.
We should look around the colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.text:
Sure, but we should also consider makin'
time to look for our next triangle.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.text:
Oh, right. That's what the
two of you came here for.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't reckon this thing's much
interested in listenin' to us.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.text:
And I don't think it's happy
about being woken up!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.text:
What do animals do when they
wake up outta hibernation?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.text:
Well, a critter that size ain't gonna be
sated by chowin' down on a few bugs!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_040.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_040.text:
You think it's coming for us!?
Augh! It's going to eat everything
and everyone in the colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text: I sure hope not, but I also reckon so!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Actually, I think it's just makin'
for one of the other colonies.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, at least we kept
this one safe for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text: We need to get after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
It's gonna attack another colony!
We need to get after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text: I sure hope not, but I also reckon so!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text: Looks like this warn't its target.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Do you think that triangle
you're looking for is here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text: I sure as heck hope so.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So is it supposed to make the ground shake?
Because that's absolutely happening!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Not so far as I know,
but I reckon anything's possible!

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.text: A worm popped outta the ground!

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, sometimes you find goodies when you dig
holes. At first you might think that something's
gotten in your way, but worms often hide out
in places like that, so I personally welcome it.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Sure ain't what I'm aimin' to do here—
but since your people love eating 'em,
I suppose it's not all bad.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Considering we found one already,
I'm guessing you two may just be
my lucky charms.

SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_GIMK_BOFO_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Trying to butter us up ain't gonna
get you nowhere, pardner.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Primitive and violent to the very last.
Nothing good ever comes of dealing with
them, but let's hope this ends up being
the exception that proves the rule. Anyway, there's gotta be a clue here,
so let's get to looking.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I ain't a fan of skulkin' around,
but I suppose we got no choice
here but to sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
The worms are gone.
The Creator is angry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
We do not have enough offerings.
I will find an offering for the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
What's this Creator they're
talkin' about there, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
No idea—but if I had to guess, I'd say
they thought one up for themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Pathetic. Is that really
the best you can do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They are strong. So strong.
We cannot give them as offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I will search for an offering.
I will search elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, this ain't good! I'm guessin'
they're off to attack everyone they
deem worthy of bein' an 'offering.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Offerings... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: You return. What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about this, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth is dirty now.
The earth is bad.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth's life is the world's life.
It is hopeless.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: So there's nothing we can do!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You're real quick to throw in the towel, pard.
We're talkin' about the end of the world here;
I woulda thought everyone would be runnin'
around like a bunch of headless chickens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We pray to the Creator.
We pray every day.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You know a way outta this mess,
don't you? I can tell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There is one way.
But it will anger the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Spit it out anyhow.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
No. The Creator hates the weak.
We must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Well? How's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You are strong. The Creator likes you.
We can tell you now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Then cough it up, feller!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Wake up the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth?
Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth eats foul dirt.
The Lord of the Earth makes clean dirt.
The Lord of the Earth serves the Creator.
The Lord of the Earth made the world with the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth is asleep.
It has been sleeping long and long.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You ain't just feedin' us some
faerie tale here, are you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
No. But also, it is dangerous.
The Lord of the Earth is violent.
The Lord of the Earth listens only to the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
It is bad to wake it up
of your own will.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Well, if this Creator ain't going to
intervene to save everyone, then I
guess we gotta step in. Right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course!
We can take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So where are we gonna find
this Lord of the Earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Remove the keystones. There are two.
This will wake the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: And where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There and there. One in each place.
They are big stones. With pictures.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: All right, let's go to work.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They are extremely prolific—by which
I mean there's a heck of a lot of 'em. They're not hostile, exactly, but they sure
ain't friendly either. I wouldn't be here if
I didn't have to be, so let's start looking
for clues.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I ain't a fan of skulkin' around,
but I suppose we got no choice
here but to sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
The colony's food reserves are low.
We must go harvesting.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
We are going to procure
some of them right now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I found the perfect seedbeds
right here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
What the heck are these things!?
There ain't no end to 'em!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: We cannot use them as seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Well, this ain't good! I'm guessin'
they're off to attack everyone they
deem worthy of bein' a 'seedbed.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Seedbeds... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Honestly, I don't know 'em very well—
rarely even seen 'em, in fact. All I
know is I wanna find a clue and get
out of here as quick as we can.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
I ain't a fan of skulkin' around,
but I suppose we got no choice
here but to sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Why don't we go to the toys?
We could play with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Oooh, that could be fun.
But we need feed for the toys.
Let's go find some.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
I wonder what toys
even are to frogs?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
What are you doin',
you filthy toads!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They are not good for feed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Boo! Killjoys! Boo!
Let's look somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Well, this ain't good! I'm guessin'
they're off to attack everyone they
deem worthy of bein' 'feed.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Feed... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
The Bashar are gatherin' up the folks
they kidnapped! I wonder what they're
plannin' to do with 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
We've brought our offerings, O Creator!
Feast well! Feast well!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
Look, it's the Bashar!
I wonder what they're doin'.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: We were unable to gather offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: Then you will be our offering.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Sweet Capitol City! The fellers they
kidnapped got turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
You saw our ceremony. This is bad.
We must kill everyone who saw.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
That Bashar just turned
into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
The Creator created this world.
The Creator gives us worms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
But the Creator has been angry lately.
So we must give offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Offerings? Those are just a bunch of
carnivorous mushrooms, you dirtbags!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text: Do not go against the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
The Naml are gatherin' up the folks
they kidnapped! I wonder what they're
plannin' to do with 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
You will become seedbeds.
Seedbeds for our food.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Look, it's the Naml!
I wonder what they're doin'.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Sadly, we met with an obstacle and
were unable to secure our seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
This responsibility lies with you.
You will be our seedbed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Sweet Capitol City! The fellers they
kidnapped got turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
You have learned the secret to our
food supply. This cannot stand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
That Naml just turned
into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Securing our food. These mushrooms
create an infinite supply of seedbeds
from other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms will allow us
to live forever.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text: You're sacrificing people!? What a sick joke!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
The Dufda are gatherin' up the folks
they kidnapped! I wonder what they're
plannin' to do with 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Hooray for all of you!
You get to be feed for our toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Look, it's the Dufda!
I wonder what they're doin'.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Sorryyy! Stuff came up and
I couldn't bring anyone.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Sweet Capitol City! The fellers they
kidnapped got turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
You saw our toys, didn't you?
We cannot allow this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
That Dufda just turned
into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms are our toys.
Aren't they cool?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
They turn regular people into mushroom
people. Isn't that awesome?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Stop playing with lives,
you pimply tadpoles!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
That's manure and you know it!
This world is eat or be eaten!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Guess we should stay outta their way.
I wonder if any Bashar are here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Bashar! What do you want, you scoundrel?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: An offering! An offering!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They're under attack!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Better just hang back...

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They got taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: This ain't gettin' us nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Foiled again. They are strong.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: You okay, feller?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I did not ask for your help.
You did this without permission.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Ain't no need to be so aggressive.
We just wanted to ask if you knew
why it's been so hard for folks
to catch worms lately.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Guess we should stay outta their way.
I wonder if any Dufda are here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
What does a Dufda want from this place?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Found feed! Found feed!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They're under attack!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Better just hang back...

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They got taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: This ain't gettin' us nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Uuugh. Fiiine.
Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: You okay, feller?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I didn't ask for your help!
You just went ahead and gave it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Ain't no need to be so aggressive.
We just wanted to ask if you knew
why it's been so hard for folks
to catch worms lately.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I told you, I have nothing to say.
Now begone from this place.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
There is no cause. The clean earth has
merely become sullied over the passing
of many, many years.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
That is what earth is. The coming end
of the earth's life span means the world's
end is upon us as well. This is our fate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You're real quick to throw in the towel, pard.
We're talkin' about the end of the world here;
I woulda thought everyone would be runnin'
around like a bunch of headless chickens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We Naml have prepared for this situation by
building up our food stores for a long time.
Even if there are no more worms to capture,
we will endure.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You know a way outta this mess,
don't you? I can tell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You are sharp. You are clever. Yes, there is a way—but it comes with
great risk. So instead of engaging with
that risk, we chose a more definitive way
of extending our life span.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So you don't care if everyone else dies
as long as the Naml are all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Yet we are not the only ones doing so.
No, your words are not something
I care to hear from a selfish Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Easy now! Ain't no need to fight
We'll save your world and everyone
will be happy, all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Hold on! I never agreed to this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Oh? That's a right shame. Didn't think a
family man with a strong sense of right
and wrong like you could turn his back
on this, but I guess I was plumb wrong.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: H-hey, I never said I won't do it! I will! I'll do it for my family!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
This is not something we can leave
to the weak. So before I tell you,
I must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Well? You satisfied?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well done. I suppose it is safe
to leave this in your hands.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So what do we need to do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You must wake the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
In the beginning, this world was naught but
sullied soil. But the Lord of the Earth
purified the land, creating the chance for
life to blossom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Once it was finished, it is said the
Lord of the Earth slipped into a
long slumber in a place unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You ain't just feedin' us some
faerie tale here, are you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Even if you manage to rouse the Lord of the Earth,
it does not mean it will purify the earth as we
hope. Indeed, it may go beyond purification and
end up destroying the entire world.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Do you understand the risk that comes with
waking a being that has the power to remake
the world completely?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
If we don't do anything, the world is
doomed for sure—so we're just gonna
have to roll the dice on this one.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course!
We can take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So where are we gonna find
this Lord of the Earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I know not where it is, but legends claim the
Lord of the Earth is held in slumber by two
keystones of opposing powers. If you move
them, it might cause the Lord to awaken.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Each stone rests not far from this colony.
Look for enormous rocks carved with reliefs
of creatures unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: All right, let's go to work.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Ew! Get out of here, Bashar!
You're gross!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Bashar's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
You have any idea why it's so
dang hard to catch worms lately?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Have the Naml really come here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Naml's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
You have any idea why it's so dang
hard to catch worms lately?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Nothing's causing it!
The soil is just dirty now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
It's the end of the earth's life,
which means it's the end of the world's
life—and you can't do much about that!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
You're real quick to throw in the towel, pard.
We're talkin' about the end of the world here;
I woulda thought everyone would be runnin'
around like a bunch of headless chickens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We Dufda take the days as they come.
Now we'll just have fun until the end!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
You know a way outta this mess,
don't you? I can tell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
You're an interesting one, friend!
Yes, there's a way—we just don't
care about it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text: Well, we do. So spit it out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Fiiine, I'll tell you...
AFTER you play with me!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: That was a mighty fine workout.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Wee hee hee! What fun!
So fine, I'll tell you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: So what do we need to do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You have to wake up the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Some weirdo who eats the dirty earth and
makes it all clean. I heard he cleaned the
whole world once back when it was all filthy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You ain't just feedin' us some
faerie tale here, are you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
No, it's definitely true!
But I wouldn't try and involve
yourselves in it if I were you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
In fact, he'll probably get all mad
that you woke him and go hog wild!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Then we'll just have to subdue him
and get the job done! Right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Uh... S-sure! Of course!
We can take care of this, no sweat!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So where are we gonna find
this Lord of the Earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Dunno! Oh, but I hear it's snoozing 'cause
of two keystones with opposing powers?
So you probably wanna try moving those.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
There's one in one place, and another in...
Ummmm... Some other place. They're big rocks
with carvings of weird creatures on 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: All right, let's go to work.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Are the Naml really here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They're under attack!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Better just hang back...

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They got taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: This is gettin' us nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You okay, feller?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
You have any idea why it's so dang
hard to catch worms lately?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Are the Dufda really here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
I'm gonna make you feed
for my toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They're under attack!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Better just hang back...

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Not on my watch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They got taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: This is gettin' us nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Ugh, stop bothering me!
Fiiine, I'll go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You okay, feller?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
You have any idea why it's so dang
hard to catch worms lately?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
This must be one of those keystones.
Let's get to movin' it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
It moved a little, but we're gonna
need to give it more grease!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, look at the keystone!
The relief is moving!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, that was a surprise.
What WAS that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Reckon the keystones are part of
a security system so people don't
mess with this stuff by accident.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Seems like we've stumbled on
the real thing, in that case.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
So we have to do it again?
Ugh. Talk about annoying.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
I bet those reliefs are
gonna attack us again.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text:
We moved both keystones, which means
the Lord of the Earth should wake up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text: Came from over there. Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Your stones. So many stones.
Will you give them to me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
You really want these old stones?
Heck, you're welcome to 'em, but...

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps they are mere stones to you,
but they are necessities to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Honestly, carryin' those things was such a
hassle that I was ready to just toss 'em out.
So if you want 'em, be my guest, feller.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, what fine stones! Please accept
this small token of my thanks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text: What are you gonna use 'em for?

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text: You will find out soon enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
Well, I suppose it don't matter
so long as it's ain't anything bad.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text: So many... Perhaps this is enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
I have been exposed to the elements
this whole time, but now I can
finally rest in peace.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have been a great help to me.
But now, farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W08_EVAR_BOFO_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Feller was buildin' his own grave.
Rest in peace there, pard.
